parameters.content:
### What you do:
Configure the schedule trigger to set your preferred monitoring frequency (default: Mondays at 9 AM)
Define monitoring topics by adding search queries to the Google Sheets "Query" sheet
Ensure Discord bot permissions are properly configured for the target channel

### What the system does:
Triggers workflow execution based on scheduled intervals (configurable via cron expression)
Initiates comprehensive news monitoring cycle for all configured topics
Prepares system for multi-topic news analysis and content generation
Coordinates sequential processing of search queries and content delivery

### Result:
‚úÖ Automated news monitoring without manual intervention
‚úÖ Customizable scheduling for optimal team communication timing
‚úÖ Scalable monitoring for multiple industry topics and keywords
‚úÖ Consistent intelligence gathering for competitive awareness
# Phase 2: Search Query Management and Topic Processing

### What you do:
Maintain and update search queries in the designated Google Sheets document
Add new monitoring topics, keywords, or industry-specific terms as needed
Review and refine query effectiveness based on delivered content quality

### What the system does:
Retrieves monitoring topics from Google Sheets "Query" sheet
Processes each search query individually for comprehensive coverage
Initiates sequential news searches to avoid API rate limiting
Prepares topic-specific news collection for analysis and synthesis

### Result:
‚úÖ Centralized management of monitoring topics and keywords
‚úÖ Easy addition and modification of search parameters
‚úÖ Systematic processing of all configured monitoring queries
‚úÖ Flexible topic management for evolving business needs
# Phase 3: Comprehensive News Discovery and Collection

### What the system does:
Executes Google News searches for each configured query using SerpAPI
Retrieves top news results with comprehensive metadata (titles, sources, dates, snippets)
Processes and ranks news articles by relevance and publication date
Extracts the top 3 most relevant articles per topic for detailed analysis
Handles API rate limiting and retry logic for reliable data collection

**News Collection Features:**
- Real-time Google News integration via SerpAPI
- Automatic relevance scoring and article ranking
- Comprehensive metadata extraction (source, date, snippet)
- Multi-topic parallel processing capability

### Result:
‚úÖ Comprehensive news coverage across all monitored topics
‚úÖ Top-quality article selection based on relevance and recency
‚úÖ Complete source attribution and publication timing
‚úÖ Reliable news discovery with error handling and retry mechanisms
# Phase 4: Deep Content Analysis and Article Scraping

### What the system does:
Scrapes full content from the top 3 selected articles per topic using Firecrawl
Converts article content to clean markdown format for AI processing
Implements retry logic and error handling for reliable content extraction
Preserves article structure, headings, and key formatting elements
Handles various website formats and content management systems

**Content Extraction Capabilities:**
- Full-text article scraping with clean formatting
- Multi-website compatibility and format handling
- Automatic content structure preservation
- Error handling for inaccessible or protected content

### Result:
‚úÖ Complete article content captured for in-depth analysis
‚úÖ Clean, formatted content ready for AI processing
‚úÖ Comprehensive coverage of key industry developments
‚úÖ Reliable content extraction despite varied website formats
# Phase 5: AI-Powered Content Analysis and Synthesis

### What the system does:
Processes scraped articles using Claude 4 Sonnet for intelligent analysis
Generates structured summaries following consistent formatting standards
Creates topic-specific intelligence reports with key insights and implications
Maintains professional tone and factual accuracy in all generated content
Formats analysis results for optimal Discord presentation

**AI Analysis Features:**
- Advanced content comprehension and synthesis
- Consistent formatting and structure across all topics
- Key insight extraction and trend identification
- Professional writing style suitable for business communication

### Result:
‚úÖ High-quality intelligence reports generated automatically
‚úÖ Consistent professional formatting across all monitoring topics
‚úÖ Key insights and implications clearly highlighted
‚úÖ Actionable intelligence ready for team consumption
# Phase 6: Content Optimization for Discord Delivery

### What the system does:
Aggregates all topic analyses into comprehensive monitoring report
Implements intelligent text segmentation to comply with Discord's 2000-character limit
Maintains content coherence while splitting longer analyses into multiple messages
Preserves formatting and readability across message segments
Optimizes message flow for sequential delivery

**Discord Optimization Features:**
- Automatic message length compliance (under 2000 characters)
- Intelligent text segmentation maintaining content flow
- Formatting preservation across multiple messages
- Sequential message preparation for smooth delivery

### Result:
‚úÖ Content perfectly formatted for Discord platform constraints
‚úÖ Coherent message flow maintained across multiple segments
‚úÖ Professional presentation optimized for team communication
‚úÖ Automated compliance with platform messaging limitations
# Phase 7: Automated Team Communication and Report Delivery

### What the system does:
Delivers engaging introduction message to Discord channel with branded personality
Posts segmented intelligence reports in proper sequence to maintain readability
Sends conclusion message to complete the monitoring cycle
Implements message timing to ensure proper delivery order
Uses branded "Claptrap" persona for consistent team engagement

**Discord Delivery Features:**
- Branded bot persona for engaging team communication
- Sequential message delivery maintaining proper flow
- Professional intelligence reporting with personality elements
- Automated conclusion and cycle completion messaging

### Result:
‚úÖ Professional intelligence reports delivered directly to team Discord channel
‚úÖ Engaging branded communication maintaining team interest
‚úÖ Complete monitoring cycle with clear beginning and conclusion
‚úÖ Consistent timing and delivery for reliable team updates
